DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate compare effectiveness iv ibuprofen iv paracetamol bariatric surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Comparisons iv Ibuprofen iv Paracetamol During Bariatric Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation effectiveness iv ibuprofen iv paracetamol postoperative pain , opioid consumption , side effect morbidly obese patient undergo bariatric laparoscopic surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy gastric bypass surgery Hepatic disfunction , Renal failure ( creatinine > 3 mg/dL , creatinin clearance < 60 mL/dk urine output < 500 mL/day ) history dialysis 28 day surgery , A history gastrointestinal bleeding bleed diathesis 6 week surgery , therapeutic dose anticoagulation therapy ( except subcutaneous heparin prophylactic dose ) , Angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor antihypertensive combination furosemide , A history opioid addiction opioid tolerance Allergy study drug , Noncooperative patient pain assessment
